c74object.name: maq.util.parameters
c74object.description: Takes a mono audio input and pans it across two output channels using a constant power formula found in Roads 1996, p 460-1. Processing uses an internal table of 1024 samples to reduce CPU load. Panning position can be controlled by a signal or float input.

inlet.digest: Audio signal: mono signal to be panned.

inlet.description: Input should be limited to values between 0. and 1., with hard left equivalent to 0 and hard right equivalent to 1.

method.name: float
method.description: Numbers can be used instead of signal objects to control pan position. If a signal is also connected to the inlet, float messages will be ignored. Any numbers sent to the left inlet will be ignored.

method.name: signal
method.description:
In left inlet: Monoaural signal to be panned across the two outlets.
In right inlet: Specifies the pan position between 0. and 1, with hard left equivalent to 0 and hard right equivalent to 1. Values of 0.5 would represent the signal being equally balanced between the left and right output channels.

method.name: getinfo
method.digest: Post information about object to Max window
method.description: Retrieves basic information about the object author and when the object was last updated. Date can be used to identify different versions of the objects in circulation.
